description: This file defines a base class 'BaseProvider' for cloud service providers, outlining common interface methods such as getInventory, getCosts, and validateCredentials, with some default implementation details.

classes.name: BaseProvider
classes.description: A base class for cloud providers that specifies common interface methods and default capabilities.

methods.name: constructor(name)
methods.description: Initializes a new provider instance with a given name.

methods.name: getInventory()
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve inventory data for cloud resources, to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: getCosts()
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve cost data for cloud resources, to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: validateCredentials()
methods.description: Abstract method to validate cloud provider credentials, to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: getCapabilities()
methods.description: Returns the capabilities of the provider, including supported features and actions.

calls: throw new Error('getInventory() must be implemented by provider')
throw new Error('getCosts() must be implemented by provider')
throw new Error('validateCredentials() must be implemented by provider')
